title: David Letterman sports Santa beard on walk with his 11-year-old son Henry in New York City
content:
David Letterman is nearly unrecognizable four months after quitting CBS' The Late Show, thanks to his newly grown beard. 

The facial hair made the retired late-night talk show host look a lot like Santa when he was pictured walking in New York City with his 11-year-old son Henry on Sunday.  

Letterman stepped down as host of the Late Show in May, and was replaced by comedian Stephen Colbert. 
   
David Letterman sported a snowy beard when he went for a walk in New York City with his son Henry on Sunday 
   
Letterman retired from his position as host of CBS' Late Show four months ago. He was replaced by comedian Stephen Colbert
